survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Infrastructure Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their experiences with public EV charging stations, including ease of use, reliability, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging stations do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open-text (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What type of EV charging stations do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections with an 'Other' option for additional input.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging infrastructure?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in public EV charging infrastructure?
